notes: Depth motion sample tests FLF2V's ability to handle foreground/background separation. Foreground (coffee cup) must remain perfectly stable while background (barista) has subtle motion. Thresholds are slightly lower than character sample since multi-plane motion is more challenging.

expectedResults.description: Foreground object maintains exact position throughout video while background subject shows subtle natural motion
expectedResults.primaryConcern: Coffee cup must not move or change appearance
expectedResults.secondaryConcern: Steam should rise naturally, depth of field blur should be maintained
expectedResults.acceptableVariance: Minor steam pattern variation, slight background subject pose differences within blur
